title: 'PHASE 6: Academic Integration'
labels: 'phase-6,review'

---

## Description
Complete Phase 6 of the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook development: Academic Integration. This phase compiles exercises and evaluation materials, develops troubleshooting guides, and conducts comprehensive technical review.

## Deliverables
- Chapter 15: Performance Evaluation
- Chapter 16: Troubleshooting and Best Practices
- Exercise sets with solutions
- Complete technical review

## Entry Criteria
- Phase 5 deliverables completed and approved
- Complete simulated humanoid system functional
- All previous content validated through simulation

## Exit Criteria
- Both chapters completed and reviewed
- Exercise sets with comprehensive solutions available
- Troubleshooting guides cover common issues
- Full technical review completed by domain experts
- Textbook ready for publication

## Dependencies
- Phase 5: Reality Bridge (complete before starting)

## Validation Requirements
- Exercises must be appropriate for undergraduate level
- Solutions must be complete and accurate
- Troubleshooting guides must be practical and effective
- All content must meet academic standards
- Textbook must satisfy all requirements in original specification

## Timeline
[Assign milestone for completion]
